title: Family Travel with Colleen Kelly
overview: Designed for parents and grandparents alike, Family Travel with Colleen Kelly reveals the ins-and-outs of family travel. Parent, travel writer and seasoned traveler Colleen Kelly explores must-see destinations and family-friendly attractions throughout the United States and abroad. Along the way, shares expert travel tips and insights to create easier family vacations Ô¨Ålled with once-in-a-lifetime memories. Each 30-minute episode offers a personalized behind-the-scenes tour with an upbeat, high-energy delivery and pace.
